name: All Hams on Deck!
description:
Wowie, it's All Hams on Deck!

The hit (?) mobile game is now available on your computer!

  • Bounce that ham!
  • 50+ pigs to acquire!
  • Aim for the highest score you can!

For this version, all microtransactions are removed, and the Coink economy is rebalanced and booming better than ever. The top 5 scores are now tracked locally so you can show your friends how cool you are.

If you don't feel like payin' a few bucks for this delectable game, it's free to play on iOS and Android!

Have fun on the seas! - The Bread & Butter Game Co. 🐷❤️
